column1: #Text=" Korra says : " Where are the prisoners ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra , this is crazy .
#Text=You promised me you would n't do anything rash .
#Text=Do you have something you wan na say to your sister ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " Ikki , I 'm glad you 're back .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Yeah , sorry we made fun of you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I wanted to apologize for how I acted yesterday .
#Text=I 've worked so hard to celebrate Dad 's legacy that I may have overlooked the parts of him that were less than ideal .
#Text=" Kya says : " And we 're sorry for dumping our frustrations with Dad out on you .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Yeah , you did n't deserve that .
#Text=" Kya says : " I thought you two might wan na see this .
#Text=Mom gave it to me before we left .
#Text=" Bumi says : " That is one good - looking family , huh ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That 's one happy family .
